fields.qry_txt: SELECT I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.URGT_YN, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.SHPM_NUM, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.LD_LEG_ID, I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.FRM_PKUP_DTT, I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.TO_PKUP_DTT, I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.FRM_DLVY_DTT, I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.TO_DLVY_DTT, to_char("FRM_PKUP_DTT","mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm") AS FROM_PU_DTT, to_char("TO_PKUP_DTT","mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm") AS TO_PU_DTT, to_char("FRM_DLVY_DTT","mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm") AS FROM_DLV_DTT, to_char("TO_DLVY_DTT","mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm") AS TO_DLV_DTT, I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.CUR_OPTLSTAT_ID, I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.CUST_CD, I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.DIV_CD, I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.LGST_GRP_CD, I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.FRM_SHPG_LOC_CD, I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.TO_SHPG_LOC_CD AS FINAL_SHIP_TO, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.TO_SHPG_LOC_CD, I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.SHPM_DESC FROM I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T INNER JOIN I2TM_APP.SHPM_T ON I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.SHPM_ID=I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.SHPM_ID WHERE (((I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.TO_PKUP_DTT)><TODAYSTART>-<HIST>) AND ((I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.TO_PKUP_DTT)<now() + 3) AND ((I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.CUR_OPTLSTAT_ID)<"215") AND ((I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.CUST_CD) Like <CUST_CD>) AND ((I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.DIV_CD) Like <DIVISION> ) AND ((I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.LGST_GRP_CD) Like <LGST_GRP>)) ORDER BY DATEVALUE(I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.TO_PKUP_DTT), I2TM_APP.SHPM_T.SHPM_NUM;

SELECT DISTINCT I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.LD_LEG_ID, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.CUR_OPTLSTAT_ID, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.FRST_SHPG_LOC_CD, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.LAST_SHPG_LOC_CD, to_char("STRD_DTT","mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm") AS START_DATE, to_char("END_DTT","mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm") AS END_DATE, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.LGST_GRP_CD, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.DIV_CD, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.STRD_DTT, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.END_DTT
FROM I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T INNER JOIN I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T ON I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.LD_LEG_ID = I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.LD_LEG_ID
WHERE (((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.CUR_OPTLSTAT_ID)<"345") AND ((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.LGST_GRP_CD) Like <LGST_GRP>) AND ((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.DIV_CD) Like <DIVISION>) AND ((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.CUST_CD) Like <CUST_CD>) AND ((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.STRD_DTT)>=<TODAYSTART> - <HIST>) AND ((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.END_DTT)<Now()))
ORDER BY I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.STRD_DTT;

SELECT DISTINCT I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.LD_LEG_ID AS Load, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.FRST_SHPG_LOC_CD AS "First Stop", I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.LAST_SHPG_LOC_CD AS "Last Stop", I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.SCDD_DTT AS "Scheduled Date", I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.STRD_DTT AS "Started Date", I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.TOT_SCLD_WGT AS Weight, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.TOT_VOL AS Volume, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.NUM_SHPM AS Shipments, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.NUM_STOP AS Stops, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.CUST_CD AS Customer
FROM I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T INNER JOIN I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T ON I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.LD_LEG_ID = I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.LD_LEG_ID
WHERE (((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.TOT_SCLD_WGT)<=1000) AND ((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.CUST_CD)=<CUST_CD>) AND ((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.LGST_GRP_CD)=<LGST_GRP>) AND ((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.DIV_CD)=<DIVISION>))
ORDER BY I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.LD_LEG_ID;

SELECT DISTINCT I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.LD_LEG_ID AS Load, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.FRST_SHPG_LOC_CD AS "First Stop", I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.LAST_SHPG_LOC_CD AS "Last Stop", I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.SCDD_DTT AS "Scheduled Date", I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.STRD_DTT AS "Started Date", I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.TOT_SCLD_WGT AS Weight, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.TOT_VOL AS Volume, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.NUM_SHPM AS Shipments, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.NUM_STOP AS Stops, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.CUST_CD AS Customer
FROM I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T INNER JOIN I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T ON I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.LD_LEG_ID = I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.LD_LEG_ID
WHERE (((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.TOT_SCLD_WGT)<=10000) AND ((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.CUST_CD)=<CUST_CD>) AND ((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.LGST_GRP_CD)=<LGST_GRP>) AND ((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.DIV_CD)=<DIVISION>))
ORDER BY I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.LD_LEG_ID;

SELECT DISTINCT I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.LD_LEG_ID AS Load, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.FRST_SHPG_LOC_CD AS "First Stop", I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.LAST_SHPG_LOC_CD AS "Last Stop", I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.SCDD_DTT AS "Scheduled Date", I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.STRD_DTT AS "Started Date", I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.TOT_SCLD_WGT AS Weight, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.TOT_VOL AS Volume, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.NUM_SHPM AS Shipments, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.NUM_STOP AS Stops, I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.CUST_CD AS Customer
FROM I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T INNER JOIN I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T ON I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.LD_LEG_ID = I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.LD_LEG_ID
WHERE (((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.TOT_SCLD_WGT)<=20000) AND ((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.CUST_CD)=<CUST_CD>) AND ((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.LGST_GRP_CD)=<LGST_GRP>) AND ((I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_DETL_T.DIV_CD)=<DIVISION>))
ORDER BY I2TM_APP.LD_LEG_T.LD_LEG_ID;

SELECT RPT_PRT_QUE_T.*, to_char(QUE_DTT,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI') AS QUE_Date_Time, to_char(STRT_DTT,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI') AS STRT_Date_Time, to_char(CPLD_DTT,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI') AS CPLD_Date_Time
FROM i2tm_app.RPT_PRT_QUE_T
WHERE CPLD_DTT Is Null
ORDER BY QUE_DTT DESC , STRT_DTT DESC;

SELECT OPMR_QUE_T.QUE_ID, to_char(QUE_DTT,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI') AS QUED_DTT, to_char(STRT_DTT,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI') AS STRTD_DTT, OPMR_QUE_T.CPLD_DTT, OPMR_QUE_T.PLAN_ID, OPMR_QUE_T.CUST_CD, OPMR_QUE_T.USR_CD, OPMR_QUE_T.STAT_ENU
FROM i2tm_app.OPMR_QUE_T
WHERE (((OPMR_QUE_T.CPLD_DTT) Is Null) AND ((OPMR_QUE_T.STAT_ENU)!='5') AND ((OPMR_QUE_T.QUE_DTT)>current_date-14))
ORDER BY QUE_DTT DESC;
